topic.title: How to port-forward on OpenVPN server?
topic.body:
Hello i would like to ask Linux server admins who have experience forwarding traffic using netfilter/iptables firewall.

How do you open port on the OpenVPN server so it properly forwards the traffic via server's tun interface to the OpenVPN client who is located behind home router and having assigned LAN IP 192.168.2.5?

topic.title: Test Drive Unlimited 1 on Linux? Any tutorial?
topic.body:
Hello, i have been trying to install TDU, but it fails:
"002c:err:d3d:wined3d_resource_allocate_sysmem Failed to allocate system memory."
this appears even on clean OS restart so almost no apps running, i do not have much RAM, but 4GB RAM should be OK. I will increase RAM soon, i need to try then. But if you guys know some tutorial on TDU1 install, please let me know.

topic.title: Age of Empires III on Linux, do you kinow any tutorial?
topic.body: Do you kinow any tutorial? i have .iso images of the AOEIII
